website_summaries.verdict: Gets high praise for its durability and the fact that it looks more expensive than it is.
pros: Constructed of brown synthetic resin wicker that is weather and UV resistant
Assembly is easy, if a little time-consuming
cons: Buyers were not fans of the minimal instructions, nor that it can take up to 2 hours to assemble
Set is a little on the small side

customer_reviews.title: super super fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: super super fast shipping!!!I love love love this set. We have it on our roof deck and have received many compliments already. Also, huge storage area underneath which is great for storing alcohol. Pretty easy to assemble- my boyfriend and I did it in about fifteen minutes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar for the Price
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic bar for the price. While the amount of screws seems daunting (over 50), my husband and I knocked it out in about a half hour. The instructions are pretty straightforward. Some of the wicker was out of place or too narrow, but we could slide it around and make it look okay. The stools are sturdy, and the cushions are comfy and velcro so they don’t slide off. We needed an inexpensive bar top for our patio until we can upgrade to a custom build, and this fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaV

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Bar Set
customer_reviews.text: We like the bar & stools very much. Shipping from West coast to East coast was prompt. Thanks, UPS! Directions could have been better this the "almost" 5 stars but we had patience!! We like the set....Perfect for our new 👍🍹😊
customer_reviews.author: The Murphys

customer_reviews.title: Good product nd price
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous on our deck. Sturdy, stylish and good price. Easy to assemble, comfy cushions included. I sprayed mine with scotchgard like all my outdoor cushions and we're really enjoying this set. Plenty of hidden shelving space for drinks, cooler, snacks, cards boardgames etc. Glass top is good quality. Glass. Dont be dropping stuff on it, its real tempered glass.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great product, greater price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks great. Almost bought similar for double the price. It’s good quality and super durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality arrived early
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early was easy to put together and was as advertised. Looks great, sturdier than expected, cushions are waterproof and bar stools are comfortable perfect for our deck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice in my sun room had to find seat covers but overall good buy, easy to install n the shelves are relatively sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Acucetta

customer_reviews.title: It looks great on our lanai
customer_reviews.text: This bar looks a lot more expensive than what it is. It is exactly what I wanted. It came with everything needed to put it together.... took my husband less than 2 hours. It looks great on our lanai.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: A great bar set and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This is a bar set of superior quality. I bought this for my newly built patio and I am very so happy that I picked this over other products. It is well worth the price and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Oh

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love! For the price, you can’t beat it. The hardware looks intimidating because there’s a lot, but it’s almost all of the same hardware. So it’s nice and sturdy and fairly simple to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Suncrown Bar Set
customer_reviews.text: Finally Arrived....Easy To Assembly....Suncrown Cant Count Missing 1 Screw.... I Always Keep Spare Metric Bolts.... Looks Good Especially In My Small Patio..... Great Value For Price 4 Stars...
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Caprino

customer_reviews.title: My husband is super happy with his bar.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! He was super excited entertaining our guest with his drinks, the bar was put to good use last week for my son's First Communion celebration.
customer_reviews.author: cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Top quality and looks beautiful! Definitely worth the money...40 min to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Another Satisfied Customer 😃
customer_reviews.text: My item arrived timely. It was easy to assemble. The glass that goes on top of the bar arrived shattered but after contacting Amazon and the company, the glass was replaced in a few days. The customer service was awesome. I love the product so far. I can’t wait to entertain my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA HINTON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable bar. Very sturdy and well made. 5+ stars for company communications!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi T

customer_reviews.title: This is a very sturdy and nice looking addition to our deck.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was not difficult. The quality is very good. My husband is very meticulous, we have sent multiple items back in the past because he didn’t like them, but he was pleasantly pleased with this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great set, sturdy, looks nice and great Customer Service from order to delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Desimone

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a small outdoor bar
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size bar for the space on my patio and at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Karen F

customer_reviews.title: Chairs wobble but looks great!
customer_reviews.text: The chairs wobble a bit otherwise it looks great! Can’t wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: V. Tanner

customer_reviews.title: The bar has was easy to put together and all parts were included
customer_reviews.text: The bar has was easy to put together and all parts were included. It has worked great and is easy to move around to just the right spot depending on how we want to use it. I highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these. We love them. They are really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Ec

customer_reviews.title: Nice set and good value.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. I like the color and chair cushions. The glass top adds some class to it. The shelves could be a little bit sturdier to hold glasses and alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: Leizl

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, it was exactly what I was looking ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, it was exactly what I was looking for, only issue was when I was putting it together I came up 2 washer rings short.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 to cover the length of my space and we’re very happy with the turnout. Assembly is tedious but it’s all worth it. We absolutely love our bars
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I ordered 2 to have an L shaped bar.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bar at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Matches out lounges perfection. Completes the look for a lot less than other sites.
customer_reviews.author: Jane K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: High quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality of the purchase. Took me about an hour and a half to put it together because of all the screws. Looks great with my other dark wicker patio furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Shipped within a week as promised. Easy to assemble. Nice looking set and Very happy with item.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small bar!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect small bar for patio. Good price for good construction. Easy to assemble and worked great for a backyard party
customer_reviews.author: sue french

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Attractive Bar
customer_reviews.text: Item came just as pictured. Assembly was easy and sturdy product. Love the look once setup and very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Glory Road Transport

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Exactly what I expected. Very good quality. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: james liepa

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product is damaged the front a few pieces are peeling. Amazon is no help at all. Very upset.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Excited!!!
customer_reviews.text: We just assembled it today and it's beautiful! Assembly is quick and easy... Can't wait to show it off to my friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Big hit at our annual BBQ pool party!
customer_reviews.author: G L.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Not too big for the area i needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Franklin

customer_reviews.title: This bar is truly amazing. Well made
customer_reviews.text: This bar is truly amazing. Well made, almost too heavy for one man to handle. Stylish. This was a true "find".
customer_reviews.author: Shoelady

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Like it could be a little larger but happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: gene

customer_reviews.title: It is not an easy assembly for a single woman with very limited instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping but mine was flawed in so many ways. It is not an easy assembly for a single woman with very limited instructions just pictures of what it should looks like. I wish I had shopped around for a better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SUNCROWN Outdoor Bar Set 3-Piece Brown Wicker Patio Furniture - Glass Bar and Two Stools with Cushions for Patios, Backyards, Porches, Gardens or Poolside
feature_bullets: BEAUTIFUL OUTDOOR ALL WEATHER WICKER - Brown synthetic resin wicker designed for the outdoors. It is weather and UV resistant. Looks great in any setting!
PERFECT FOR ENTERTAINING - A classic yet simple design, this outdoor wicker bar set is the perfect addition to any party or small gathering with friends.
ELEGANT GLASS TOP - Bar comes with an extra-wide elegant tempered glass surface. Matches seamlessly with the brown wicker. Bar top measures 40” (L) x 23” (W).
CONVENIENT STORAGE - The bar comes with two 17” tall shelves. This space is ideal for storing drinks, mixers, ice, dishes, cutlery or anything else!

QUICK & EASY ASSEMBLY - Includes all necessary hardware and instructions for a quick assembly. Estimated assembly time is 30 minutes. All packages should deliver well branded and sealed. If you find any damage caused in transit, please contact us to help you immediately!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars102 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
